info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Flathead County through 545 PM MDT... At 531 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of West Glacier, or 26 miles northeast of Evergreen, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nyack and Pinnacle. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 162 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
